author: @hamdallahabdulfatah6132
text: I started learning data science last month, and planning on applying it in Biology. Please can you recommend free bootcamp or courses. Thank you

author: @lamaadministrator2595
text: Such a great video! Can you make a video about the stacks needed for data science? I read an article on "the dark side of data science" which said that learning learning data cleaning and the algorithms is just small a part of it. You also need to have data engineering skills, like Snowflake, AWS, Hadoop etc. Because in a real world project you need these too. Is it true? Thanks for your response!
